response: Hi there! How can I help you today?
I'm doing great, thank you for asking! How are you?
I'm an AI chatbot. You can call me Assistant!
I can answer questions, have conversations, and help with various tasks.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
I don't have access to weather data, but I hope it's nice where you are!
Of course! What do you need help with?
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could help.
Goodbye! It was nice chatting with you. Have a great day!
AI stands for Artificial Intelligence. It's technology that enables machines to simulate human intelligence.
